property.name: Richfield Village Apartments

accessibility.door_faucet_handles: Unknown

safety.lead_safety: My unit has had an inspection and was found to be Lead-Free Interior.

parkingAndEntry.additional_parking: Onsite parking and garages - optional for an additional fee.

comments.amenities: Dogs and Cats are allowed under the following conditions: There is a maximum of two (2) pets per apartment home. Dogs are allowed under 45lbs with a $500.00 non-refundable pet fee. Restricted breeds include Rottweilers, Pit Bulls, Dobermans, and German Shepherds. Additional breeds may be restricted. Cats are allowed with a $250.00 non-refundable pet fee. Cats must be indoor only. A pet lease addendum is required.
comments.owner_manager_comments: Please bring a Government issued photo I.D. and proof of income.

property.address: 87 Federal City Road, Hopewell Township, NJ 08534

contact.address: 1249 South River Road, Suite 301, Cranbury, NJ 08512-3633

accessibility.door_faucet_handles: Non-lever handles On Doors And Faucets

parkingAndEntry.additional_parking_comments: Outdoor unassigned parking at no charge. Optional garage parking to rent.

comments.income_qualification: This is an income restricted property. There is a waiting list for these units. Rents listed are subject to change. Please visit affordablehomesnewjersey.com for current income limits and to join the waiting list.
property_amenities: Clubroom with resident lounge and fireplace
comments.propertyComments: There is a waiting list for these units. Please visit affordablehomesnewjersey.com for current income limits and to join the waiting list. This website also has more information about estimated wait times and an FAQ for questions about the programs.

property.owner_manager_comments: Please complete preliminary application online at www.affordablehomesnewjersey.com. If you cannot apply online, please call us at the number on this listing. Please leave a detailed message with your name, phone number, address, and reason for calling so we may assist you. CGP&H administers the Affordable Housing Opportunities on behalf of municipalities throughout the state. Please note that interested applicants must submit a pre-application. There may be a waiting list for units listed as available now. The application process takes several weeks even if there is no waiting list.

comments.income_qualification: See HUD requirements for min ‚Äì max income ranges. Please call for income restrictions.

property.owner_manager_comments: We are a provider of quality affordable housing throughout New Jersey and surrounding states. Income restrictions do apply. Prospective Residents should bring all of the following with them: Driver's License or Government issued photo I.D., Birth Certificate, Social Security Card, (4) weeks of Pay stubs and all bank account information. Provide information on stocks, bonds, 401k, annuities, pension, etc. Application fee to be paid by money order only.
